org.jsfml.graphics

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.graphics.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Transformable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleShape, ConvexShape, RectangleShape

    public abstract class Shape
extends SFMLNativeObject
implements Drawable
    Abstract base class for (optionally) textured shapes with (optional) outlines.

    • Method Detail

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(ConstTexture texture,
              boolean resetRect)
        Sets the texture of the shape.

        The texture may be null if no texture is to be used.

        Parameters:
        texture - the texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used.
        resetRect - true to reset the texture rect, false otherwise.

      • setTexture

        public final void setTexture(ConstTexture texture)
        Sets the texture of the shape without affecting the texture rectangle.

        The texture may be null if no texture is to be used.

        Parameters:
        texture - the texture of the shape, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used.

      • setTextureRect

        public void setTextureRect(IntRect rect)
        Sets the portion of the texture that will be used for drawing.

        An empty rectangle can be passed to indicate that the whole texture shall be used.

        The width and / or height of the rectangle may be negative to indicate that the respective axis should be flipped. For example, a width of -32 will result in a sprite that is 32 pixels wide and flipped horizontally.

        Parameters:
        rect - the texture portion.

      • setFillColor

        public void setFillColor(Color color)
        Sets the fill color of the shape.
        Parameters:
        color - the new fill color of the shape, or Color.TRANSPARENT to indicate that the shape should not be filled.

      • setOutlineColor

        public void setOutlineColor(Color color)
        Sets the outline color of the shape.
        Parameters:
        color - the new outline color of the shape.

      • setOutlineThickness

        public void setOutlineThickness(float thickness)
        Sets the thickness of the shape's outline.
        Parameters:
        thickness - the thickness of the shape's outline, or 0 to indicate that no outline should be drawn.
